title: SKT T1 Bang shows immense respect to MISFITS
body:
SKT t1 Bang: "Playing against misfits was an incredible medicine to us" (medicine[ì•½]= benefit in Korean terms. Imagine benefiting from medicine when you are sick. It's a form of expression in Korea)
Translator: "We learned a lot from the misfits"
_Twitch chat spams translator wtf_

Edit: This was an interview with Sjokz after the win against RNG, where Bang mentions Misfits.

replies.body: TSM DoubleLift: Playing against misfits was an incredible medicine to us, nahh nvm we still cocky as fk, TSM world champions 2018 baby. ezpz bio squeezy..

Anybody else watching the dislike war of that other comment?

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Not my fault, they were probably the ones who Pick'em'd MSF at 4th in groups. And now they are bandwagoning.

I placed them second, because I respected them. But there is a place to laugh, even if it is just my humor.
I actually just noticed that dislike war and laughed a little bit
Seems like a cool dude. Statements like those show maturity.
he went from being a poor nerd to a  rich nerd, of course hes going to be in good spirit

You can still be rich and be a shitty person.

Just look at Vasilli (sp?).
Even he could be in good spirits, you missed the point.
not really? good spirits or bad, a self-centered arrogant jerk is just that. Poor losers tend to be poor winners.

Yes you did miss the point. Poor losers and poor winners can still be in good spirits can still say nice things. Great people can be in bad spirits and say awful things. 

The dude's point was that he was being respectful and nice because he was in good spirits, not because he was rich.
MISFIT WORLD CHAMPIONS IN 2018 HOPEFULLY!

What he meant to say.

Bang: Oh those big-ear rat guys. Yea, they used weird champions. So Wolf said he wanted to try them since all champs are unlocked.
The Robot was not very good. And the sun lady doesn't have Ardent.
It is much better to just let me carry.
It's comments like these that show what's wrong with the mentality of many League fans...
I think the fact that you can't take a joke is wrong.
Its a pretty bad joke. You must be 12.
Doesn't dismiss the matter that the joke is quite low. If you're looking for a backed up joke, there's always Reddit
.... How is this low?
Implies that anything said is a lie and that fans will endlessly eat that kind of stuff up and interpret it their way. That's why it's low to me
I laughed...
Me too

If that's a Korean term, there's no way that a Translator could've conveyed that part to the audience without having to explain it further. This isn't a VN where you're free to research multiple translations and figure out how to best bring the same experience to other audiences.

The fact that the OP's description of the meaning of the word "medicine" in this context is longer than the statement itself, proofs that it was the right decision for the translator to not translate it word by word.
